Name: Jack-o'-NightLight
Text: Hiiiii....... I heard that you could make, Magic...things?

Name: Tired Witch
Text: ...Yeah... ([i]Poor guy looks almost as tired as I do[/i])

Name: Jack-o'-NightLight
Text: [i][wave amp=35 freq=1.8]Yawn...[/wave][/i] I keep having these... dreams..... nightmares... about these bugs. Lots of big gross bugs...eating my head in my dreams. It's kind of terrifying...in like... an existential sense, I guess.

Name: Tired Witch
Text: â€¦so you want something to help you deal with the bugs in your dream?

Name: Jack-o'-NightLight
Text: [i][wave amp=35 freq=1.8]Yaaaawwwwwn...[/wave][/i] Hmm? What bugs? Oh, right.... The bugs in my dream... who keep eating my head. Yeah...yeah if you could make me something that could deal with them... that would be great...
